articles.description: STRICTLY COME DANCING bosses have announced the BBC series will face a huge shake-up when it returns to screens next month.
articles.content:
There will also be two BBC-themed dance routines which will be performed by the professionals.

articles.title: Edinburgh Festival closing fireworks will not go ahead this year - Edinburgh Live
articles.description: Organisers of the Edinburgh International Festival have confirmed the traditional firework display to mark the end of the celebrations will not be going ahead for 2022.
articles.content:
The end of the Edinburgh Festival will not be marked with a firework display this year, officials have confirmed. 
Usually a staple of the capital's celebrations, thousands are known to gather on th… [+1535 chars]

articles.author: Lauren Williams
articles.title: Coronation Street fans 'work out' Charlie's 'real' killer as Stu Carpenter is innocent - Express
articles.description: CORONATION STREET fans have been eager to find out the truth behind Stu Carpenter's arrest and if he is secretly a cold-hearted killer. However, during Monday night's episode fans were adamant they had worked out who the real killer was.
